requirement_tested: A frontend application that fetches all dynamic data from backend APIs
user_persona: A woman visiting the health survey website for the first time.
user_goal: To navigate to the survey page and see the dynamically loaded form.

narrative_steps.title: Landing on Homepage
narrative_steps.description: Sarah opens the website and sees the homepage with navigation links. She wants to take the health survey.
narrative_steps.action: Click on the 'Survey' link in the navigation bar.
narrative_steps.expected_outcome: The survey form loads dynamically without a full page refresh, showing various input fields.

requirement_tested: A backend application that connects to a PostgreSQL database using specified environment variables
user_persona: A developer deploying the backend service.
user_goal: To verify the backend successfully connects to the PostgreSQL database.

narrative_steps.title: Starting Backend Server
narrative_steps.description: The developer starts the backend server and expects it to connect to the configured PostgreSQL instance.
narrative_steps.action: Start the backend server using environment variables for DB connection.
narrative_steps.expected_outcome: Server logs show successful connection to PostgreSQL at localhost:5432 with the correct credentials.

requirement_tested: A health survey form interface for users to input and submit health information
user_persona: A participant ready to fill out her health information.
user_goal: To complete and submit the health survey accurately.

narrative_steps.title: Filling Out Survey
narrative_steps.description: Emily begins filling out the survey, entering her age group, pregnancy status, and other personal health details.
narrative_steps.action: Fill in all required fields like age group, pregnancy status, and mental health status.
narrative_steps.expected_outcome: All fields accept input correctly and update in real-time without errors.

narrative_steps.title: Submitting Survey
narrative_steps.description: After completing the form, Emily clicks the submit button to send her responses.
narrative_steps.expected_outcome: Form data is validated and sent to the backend via POST request; a success message appears.

requirement_tested: Data management functionality to store and organize submitted survey responses
user_persona: A system administrator checking data integrity.
user_goal: To confirm that submitted survey data is properly stored in the database.

narrative_steps.title: Verifying Database Entry
narrative_steps.description: The admin runs a query after a user submits a survey to check if the record exists.
narrative_steps.action: Query the 'surveys' table in PostgreSQL for the latest submission.
narrative_steps.expected_outcome: A new row is found in the surveys table with all submitted values correctly stored.

requirement_tested: User permission management system to control access to data and features
user_persona: An admin configuring user roles in the system.
user_goal: To assign appropriate permissions to different user types.

narrative_steps.title: Setting Role Permissions
narrative_steps.description: Admin assigns roles to users ensuring they can only perform allowed actions.
narrative_steps.action: Update user roles in the backend assigning 'survey_taker', 'reviewer', or 'admin'.
narrative_steps.expected_outcome: Each user now has restricted access based on their assigned role per internal rules.

requirement_tested: Data review interface for authorized personnel to view and validate submissions
user_persona: A reviewer examining submitted health surveys.
user_goal: To view and validate a submitted survey entry.

narrative_steps.title: Accessing Review Interface
narrative_steps.description: Jenny logs in as a reviewer and navigates to the data review section.
narrative_steps.action: Navigate to the data review page.
narrative_steps.expected_outcome: A list of submitted surveys is displayed with options to view details.

narrative_steps.title: Viewing Submission Details
narrative_steps.description: She clicks on a submission to inspect the full details.
narrative_steps.action: Click on a specific survey entry from the list.
narrative_steps.expected_outcome: The detailed view of the selected survey opens up for inspection and validation.

requirement_tested: Reporting dashboard to display aggregated health data insights
user_persona: An analyst reviewing health trends among participants.
user_goal: To analyze health trends using visual reports.

narrative_steps.title: Opening Dashboard
narrative_steps.description: Alex accesses the dashboard to get insights from collected survey data.
narrative_steps.expected_outcome: Visualizations such as bar charts and pie graphs appear showing aggregated data.

narrative_steps.title: Interacting with Charts
narrative_steps.description: He hovers over segments of a chart to see more detailed breakdowns.
narrative_steps.action: Hover over sections of the pie chart representing pregnancy status.
narrative_steps.expected_outcome: Tooltip displays additional statistical information about the hovered segment.

requirement_tested: Responsive web design with whitesmoke background and dark cyan styled components
user_persona: A mobile user accessing the site on her phone.
user_goal: To have a consistent experience regardless of device size.

narrative_steps.title: Loading Site on Mobile
narrative_steps.description: Lisa visits the site on her smartphone expecting everything to look good and function smoothly.
narrative_steps.action: Open the website on a mobile browser.
narrative_steps.expected_outcome: Site renders with responsive layout adjustments, maintaining whitesmoke background and dark cyan components.

requirement_tested: Authentication system to manage user sessions and roles
user_persona: A registered user logging into the platform.
user_goal: To securely log in and maintain session during usage.

narrative_steps.title: Logging In
narrative_steps.description: Maria enters her credentials to access the platform.
narrative_steps.action: Enter username and password and click 'Login'.
narrative_steps.expected_outcome: Upon successful authentication, she receives a JWT token and gets redirected to the dashboard.

requirement_tested: Survey form validation to ensure complete and accurate data submission
user_persona: A user attempting to submit an incomplete survey.
user_goal: To understand what fields need correction before submission.

narrative_steps.title: Leaving Required Fields Blank
narrative_steps.description: Tom leaves several key fields empty and tries to submit the form immediately.
narrative_steps.action: Attempt to click 'Submit Survey' without filling required fields.
narrative_steps.expected_outcome: Highlighted error messages appear next to unfilled mandatory fields indicating they're required.

requirement_tested: Data export functionality for administrators to download survey results
user_persona: An administrator needing to share survey findings externally.
user_goal: To export all survey data in CSV format for further analysis.

narrative_steps.title: Exporting Data
narrative_steps.description: Admin navigates to the export section and initiates a data download.
narrative_steps.action: Click the 'Export' button and choose CSV format.
narrative_steps.expected_outcome: A downloadable CSV file containing all survey responses is generated and offered for download.

requirement_tested: Audit logging for tracking data access and modifications
user_persona: A compliance officer auditing system activity.
user_goal: To trace changes made to survey records by authorized users.

narrative_steps.title: Checking Audit Logs
narrative_steps.description: Officer reviews logs to verify proper handling of sensitive health data.
narrative_steps.action: Query the audit_logs table for recent data access events.
narrative_steps.expected_outcome: Log entries show timestamps, user IDs, and actions taken (create/read/update/delete) on relevant resources.

requirement_tested: Role-based access control for different user types (e.g., survey takers, reviewers, admins)
user_persona: A reviewer trying to access admin-only features.
user_goal: To be denied access to unauthorized administrative functions.

narrative_steps.title: Attempting Unauthorized Access
narrative_steps.description: Reviewer tries to navigate to the admin panel despite lacking admin privileges.
narrative_steps.action: Try to access the /admin route directly.
narrative_steps.expected_outcome: Access is blocked and the user is redirected or shown an unauthorized error message.

requirement_tested: Concurrent development setup with npm scripts for installing dependencies and running both frontend and backend
user_persona: A developer setting up the project locally for the first time.
user_goal: To easily install and start both frontend and backend services together.

narrative_steps.title: Installing Dependencies
narrative_steps.description: Developer clones the repo and wants to quickly install all dependencies for both parts.
narrative_steps.action: Run 'npm run install:all' from root directory.
narrative_steps.expected_outcome: Both frontend and backend dependencies are installed concurrently without errors.

narrative_steps.title: Running Development Servers
narrative_steps.description: Now he wants to launch both servers for local testing.
narrative_steps.expected_outcome: Frontend and backend development servers start simultaneously, ready for interaction.

requirement_tested: Database schema design to support health survey data storage and retrieval
user_persona: A database architect validating schema implementation.
user_goal: To confirm the database schema supports all necessary data structures.

narrative_steps.title: Inspecting Table Structure
narrative_steps.description: Architect inspects the created tables to ensure they match specifications.
narrative_steps.action: Connect to PostgreSQL and describe the structure of the 'surveys' table.
narrative_steps.expected_outcome: Schema matches the definition with correct column names, types, constraints, and relationships.
